Frequency once per 10 minutes;

Effect Your lantern wisp unleashes a large burst of flame, casting an unnaturally bright light. Each creature within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round and then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 2 rounds after.
